messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/5/02 8:00:02 AM Central Daylight Time,
werapfamily@... writes:


> By the way you Yankees - I hope you had a great 4th of July Celebrations
>
> Cheers
> Sue

Why thanks Sue! And I hope you had a terrific regular old 4th day of July! <g>
~Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Happy 4th of July
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/5/02 7:00:02 AM, werapfamily@optushome.com.au writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/5/02 7:00:02 AM, werapfamily@... writes:

<< By the way you Yankees - I hope you had a great 4th of July Celebrations >>

Thanks!

My kids and husband went four different directions, a friend and I ate
chicken, corn on the cob, mashed potatoes and Dr Pepper, and watched
"American Sweethearts." (Oh, and reassured the dog that the fireworks noises
and stink weren't people coming to get us. I always feel sorry for dogs on
fireworks days.)

Sandra

messages.subject: Happy 4th of July
messages.msgSnippet: By the way you Yankees - I hope you had a great 4th of July Celebrations Cheers Sue [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messages.messageBody:
By the way you Yankees - I hope you had a great 4th of July Celebrations

Cheers
Sue
